SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures
Interface GridCacheAtomicSequence

All Superinterfaces:
GridMetadataAware, Serializable
public interface GridCacheAtomicSequence
extends GridMetadataAware

This interface provides a rich API for working with distributed atomic sequence.

Note that distributed atomic sequence is only available in Enterprise Edition.

Functionality

Distributed atomic sequence includes the following main functionality:
  • Method GridCacheAtomicSequence.get() synchronously gets current value from atomic sequence.
  • Various get..(..) methods synchronously get current value from atomic sequence and increase atomic sequences value.
  • Various add..(..) increment(..) methods synchronously increase atomic sequences value and return increased value.
All previously described methods have asynchronous analogs.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicSequence.batchSize(int size) sets batch size of current atomic sequence.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicSequence.batchSize() gets current batch size of atomic sequence.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicSequence.name() gets name of atomic sequence.

Creating Distributed Atomic Sequence

Instance of distributed atomic sequence can be created by calling one of the following methods:
  • GridCache.atomicSequence(String)
  • GridCache.atomicSequence(String, long, boolean)
